example.name: passive
example.text: While [[*] renewing military aid]-1 had been considered [*T*-1]-1 out of the question , [*-1]-2 rejected [*-2] by Congress and deemphasized [*-2] by the Bush administration , Mr. Ortega 's statement provides Contra supporters with the opportunity [*] to press the administration on the issue .
